answer:
<p>In addition to other answers need to add that parameters not only helps prevent sql injection but <strong>can improve performance of queries</strong>. Sql server caching parameterized query plans and reuse them on repeated queries execution. If you not parameterized your query then <strong>sql server would compile new plan on each query</strong>(with some exclusion) execution if text of query would differ.</p>

<p><a href="https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc293623.aspx" rel="noreferrer">More information about query plan caching</a></p>
